Name: Butterfish
Description: Commonly used in dishes around the Ferngill Republic.

DescriptionLocalization.de: Wird häufig in Gerichten in der Ferngill Republic verwendet.
DescriptionLocalization.es: De uso general en platos alrededor de la República de Ferngill.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Couramment utilisé dans les plats de la République de Ferngill.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Általában az ételekben használják a Ferngill Köztársaság környékén.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Comunemente usato nei piatti della Repubblica di Ferngill.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 一般的にファーンギル共和国の料理に使用されます。
DescriptionLocalization.ko: Ferngill Republic 주변의 요리에 일반적으로 사용됩니다.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Comumente usado em pratos da República Ferngill.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Обычно используется в блюдах вокруг Ferngill Republic.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Ferngill Cumhuriyeti çevresindeki yemeklerde yaygın olarak kullanılır.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 常用于Ferngill Republic周围的菜肴。
